email_subject: Invitation to Participate in SIGAPP Event Discussions
email_body:
Dear Josephine Baldi,

As you may know, our colleagues Gale Robinson and Ray Levinson attended the prestigious GraphConnect event recently. It was an excellent opportunity for them to share their insights and they received great feedback from the cybersecurity community.

Building on this success, Gale is now preparing for SIGAPP. We believe your expertise would be greatly beneficial to her preparation and presentation, especially considering the impact of her authored work 'An Ontology for Cyber Security'.

We've created a platform for team members to discuss and provide valuable insights regarding upcoming events. It would be a great honor if you could participate and share your thoughts.

Please join the discussion here. We look forward to your invaluable contribution!

Best regards,

Ethan Hawk
